text: Arthur William Alloo was born 9 January, 1892 in Sydney and died 16 September, 1950 in Nelson. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played for New Zealand and Otago in the Plunket Shield. He was the brother of Albert Alloo and Cecil Alloo. ==Other websites== * Category:1892 births Category:1950 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Cricketers from Sydney
title: Arthur Alloo
